text: [Music]
after doing several videos on collecting
every coin in mario titles i thought
we'd try something a bit different with
super mario galaxy and that is of course
to grab every star bit the only star
bits that won't count are the ones that
spawn infinitely the only ones that do
that are those that fall from the sky
now some enemies like chain chomps
require a rainbow star to get their star
bits but i'll only need to destroy them
if i'm presented with that power-up i am
also allowed to skip levels that aren't
possible as well and only need to get 60
of the 120 stars to get to the final
boss and win so with that said let's fly
into it starting our adventure we of
course have to grab up some bunnies and
there's a few star bits found in the
flowers but that's about it flying into
gateway galaxy i had to get used to spin
attacking every single goomba since
those would get a star bits while
jumping on them only gets us coins now
before moving into an actual level i
peeked around the comet observatory for
star bits and of course there weren't
any which makes sense because otherwise
anybody could just grind them out
without even playing the game so first
we soared into good a galaxy and the
first star wasn't too bad i did have to
break a lot of these rocks by spin
attacking the red spot and this can get
annoying if you're not good at the
timing such as myself and lucky me there
were even more rocks that spewed out of
this launcher but thankfully the star
bits stopped producing after breaking
three rocks the second star just so
happened to have more of these rocks
yippee i guess and everything went fine
with the third star until i got to these
two chain chomps i knew they had bits in
them and they could only be defeated
with the rainbow star and lucky enough
there was one down the pipe i decided to
spin attack the goombas first so i'd
have ample time to get their star bits
while having time to get the ones from
the two chain chomps so i destroyed the
chain chomps and moved to the next area
only to find more chain chomps around
the corner so i tried to reach them a
few times but the rainbow star's timer
wasn't long enough for me to do this
quite frankly the rainbow star isn't
really meant for these chain chomps but
i'll still say this level isn't possible
for the sake of making my life harder
and on the honey hive galaxy the first
star has nothing too hard worth
mentioning but the second star gave me
troubles because there was even more
boulders to destroy and guess what i
destroyed every last bowler only to find
a rainbow star at the very bottom i
guess i can say i was an overachiever i
also discovered these little bolt things
have one star bit each so i had to go to
each and every one to get their bits but
otherwise this wasn't too bad there's
not much to say for the last star
besides grabbing all the bits during the
bugaboom fight it looped the
loop-de-doop galaxy i hopped onto the
mana ray and immediately lost my cursor
which is kind of a huge problem seeing
as there's star bits all over the place
my only option was to bust out another
wiimote as player 2 and try that after
finishing the tutorial trying to control
the mana ray and focus on the waves
while also looking for star bits was
extremely disorienting i died several
times just trying to get used to it
because you're forced to multitask in a
way i've never really experienced before
but thankfully there's no time limit to
completing this one so as long as you
take your time it's more than doable and
better yet flip switch galaxy has zero
star bits for an easy victory bowser
junior's robot reactor has four cages
with star bits that were really annoying
to get because the bullet bills take
forever to notice you but otherwise it
was easy and at that point i had a
really good streak of easy levels these
include sweet sweet galaxy the first
star in space junk galaxy as well as the
second one the final star has one hard
part which was getting the star bits
that tarantox released throughout the
middle of the fight slingpod galaxy has
lots of star bits but it was easy to
complete and the same goes for the first
star in battle rock galaxy jumping into
the second star all was well until we
got to this launch star before landing
there's this giant ring of star bits
that i wasn't able to grab i tried this
quite a few times and the problem was
even if i placed my cursor right on
these star bits ahead of time they were
too far away for me to grab i even tried
this with a second controller but the
problem is the bottom star bits because
they leave the screen before there's a
chance to grab them all so unfortunately
we're gonna have to skip this level for
rolling green galaxy there's a few
question mark blocks to hit that would
spawn in star bits they weren't too bad
until the third one because the bits
here spawned on this steep slant and i
had to be very careful and not fall
thank god these star bits didn't
disappear or anything because it took
quite a while but the level was possible
now i should mention that there were
goombas that i technically couldn't get
star bits from since there was no way to
spin attack them but it was impossible
to get off the ball so i don't think
they count in this particular case but
now it's time for another win streak of
stars including the one from bowser's
star reactor as well as the first second
and third star from beach bowl galaxy
flying into ghostly galaxy's first star
i was unsure if i'd be able to destroy
this chain jump that careens down the
road but by breaking this random block
it releases a rainbow star and i'm given
enough time to knock him out besides
that this level was free the following
star only has a few star bits in the
skulls when racing boo so if you move
quickly then you can win and get them
all for the last star i had to hold back
from using the star launcher so i
wouldn't miss this star bit block and
boulder geist was also a piece of cake i
got worried in bubble breeze galaxy
because i missed a ton of bits going off
this launch star but by some miracle you
can go into first person view and
collect the bits you missed there was a
bunch more to get from this question
mark coin too but that was about it and
thankfully drip drop galaxy was a piece
of cake as well as hurry scurry galaxy
but boy oh boy it's time for bowser jr's
airship armada or in other words the
time of suffering everything was going
fine until i got to this auto scrolling
section there's some cannonballs that
shoot at you but there's also spranglers
hanging from the ships i tried spin
attacking them but you have to hit them
twice in a row or they won't break and
there's four of these sprinklers jumping
on top of them just makes a coin so that
doesn't help and for whatever reason i
couldn't long jump ahead and spin attack
for a head start so then i thought i
could possibly hop from ship to ship but
instead i can only run on this teeny
tiny sliver as the rest is blocked off
from an invisible wall i was able to at
least get the star bits from the first
sprinkler this way but i couldn't make
any more progress and worse i couldn't
even use star bits to kill these dumb
things so finally i busted out the
second controller and found that i could
shake the sprinkler ahead of time and
simply had to spin attack it on the edge
and had enough time to get the star bits
that worked for one sprinkler next was
three at a time now i tried to get them
over and over and over and over and was
only ever able to hit two of these bugs
at once at this point i was really
getting worried because i absolutely had
to complete the star to unlock more
galaxies so i let the boss fight start
up and decided to bring a koopa shell
back to this spot which by the way i
can't believe you can just leave the
fight but anyway with some practice i
managed to direct hit the sprangler but
guess what the shell went right through
it yep that's right sprinklers are
invulnerable to deadly shells because
that makes sense so then i tried hitting
the sprinkler with a star bit jumping at
just the right time spin attacking and
pulling back while hitting him and then
i died this was as close as i could get
to hitting it and i couldn't even
collect the bits with this method i was
honestly running out of gas so i hit up
the mario challenge youtubers to see if
any of them had ideas and our good old
friend waluichi goswa actually had a
solution he sent me this clip where he
stood on the very edge of the platform
and back flipped up above to hit all
three at once now he didn't grab the
star bits but with a second controller
this was theoretically possible so with
that i hit up tetrabit gaming and with
the power of parsec we connected his
controller to give this stage another
try so after all the struggles and pain
with these three spranglers this was our
best attempt
yeah
there we go here we go oh my god we did
it we did it oh my god finally after all
of these tries we actually pulled this
off and was able to complete the level
this wouldn't have been possible without
waluigi goes wah tetrabit gaming and
parsec now back to the challenge gusty
guardian galaxy's first star has lots of
star bits and it's really easy the next
level has a coin that gives us the
rainbow star to hit all these prickly
plants and while we can't hit all the
ones inside the pipe there's not nearly
enough time to hit the ones on the
outside deeming this level impossible
moving on to freeze flame galaxy it was
really easy as was the second star i
skipped the third star because it had a
comet mission that i didn't want to deal
with so i went right into dusty dune
galaxy and this first star was extremely
annoying to play at the beginning
there's a goomba we need star bits from
and the only way to get to him is to
ground pound at the perfect time and not
stop on his head so we can actually spin
attack the lad then we have to hit all
these piranha plants and destroy this
giant boulder which is difficult to do
in the quicksand but that wasn't even
the hard part see there's two long rows
of starbeds that zoom past you as you
shoot from the launcher to the pipe so i
went back and grabbed some of the star
bits early to help then after dozens and
dozens of tries using two controllers i
managed to grab all the star bits by
keeping both of my hands as steady as
possible this was way harder than i
expected it to be and after that the
wrestle level was simple and now it's
time for another long streak of easy
peasy levels star 2 and star 3 were no
trouble bowser's dark plant was a breeze
as well as a level from big mouth galaxy
buoy based galaxy was painless and every
star for gold leaf galaxy and i mean
everyone took next to no effort and that
same idea applies to seaside galaxy all
of these were simple enough even if this
third star did take a while it was still
a cakewalk moving to toy time galaxy one
of the launch stars had a lot of
starbits to get but otherwise it was
simple on to the next level this first
launch star required me to get these
star bits that were shaped in a heart
and it was a lot harder than i thought
it'd be i actually had to go back and
check the footage to find there were 40
star bits to nab so as usual when i get
stuck i brought in the second controller
to help but even then mario moved so
fast through the air that it was
insanely hard to grab every bit i even
tried standing on the train track to
grab some early but i was too far away
for that to work so after dozens of
tries i somehow got all 40 of these star
bits and i have no idea how following
that event the rest of the star was a
cakewalk the final star was a bit uneasy
as getting these electro goombas on the
ice was making me squirm in my seat but
outside of that the level was easy
enough and bowser jr's lava reactor
didn't really give me a reaction as it
was painless to knock out honeycomb
galaxy was going fine until i took this
launch star and saw like a million star
bits in the air i missed a ton of them
and quite frankly i don't know if i can
get these i tried anyway with a second
controller and learned that there was 48
star bits to grab but even with the help
it was almost impossible to get even
close to nabbing them all the camera
swings at too many angles too quickly
and i can't even go into first person
when i hit the ground at any point so
i'm gonna have to pass on this star but
sans spiral galaxy was a piece of cake
and the same goes for gateway galaxy
buu's bonyard galaxy was hectic and the
ending was absolutely bonkers i
basically needed pinpoint precision to
get these last star bits on the wall and
by some stroke of luck i managed to pull
it off well except for these last three
in the skulls but i just grabbed them
before getting the star it's that time
of the month again let's blast through a
streak of easy levels these include star
1 star 2 and star 3 from deep dark
galaxy and dreadnought galaxy was more
than doable for star 1 star 2 and even
star 3. the same goes for bone fin
galaxy as well as matter spider galaxy
but then we land in melty molten galaxy
this star had me worried ahead of time
because i knew it was going to be tough
although getting all these star bits
around the volcano was immensely
satisfying the hard part was going to be
the ending with the rising lava when i
got there it was going okay until i
realized there were three boulders
coming out of the wall i knew i needed
to hit these boulders three times each
to get all of their bits but the lava
was rising too high for this to be
possible i could get the bits here
because the lava wasn't in my way and
with some well-timed long jumps and spin
jumps i could even get these bits but
the boulders from way to the left were
impossible there was nowhere for me to
stand and i was basically screwed so
what stars did i have left to try comet
stars oh goody i started with a ghost
ship daredevil run in deep dark galaxy i
basically just had to get the star bits
under the ship and complete the star
normally then there was the honey hive
cosmic mario race and surprisingly it
wasn't too hard because most star bits
were removed from the level for the race
and for the last star i picked boulder
guy's daredevil run because
well i'm a daredevil and yeah it really
wasn't too bad because this boss isn't
that hard due to its simple and slow
patterns despite what everyone else says
and just like that we have enough stars
to take on the final boss and thankfully
this last level didn't have too many
star bits and after smacking bowser
around we can prove that it is possible
to beat super mario galaxy while
touching every star bit well with at
least 60 stars anyway now i definitely
had some worries with quite a few levels
but overall this challenge was a lot
easier than i was expecting it to be
this video was quite the crunch so thank
you guys so much for watching and i hope
you have a wonderful day until next time
[Music]
